"Braver": "Braver is a well-balanced class that can handle a wide variety of situations, using its Katana for melee attacks and its Bullet Bow for long-range combat."

"\"Brave Combat\" is a Class Skill that can be used by registering it to the Subpalette. When used, it reduces your PP consumption and boosts the PP you recover from attacks for a set time.

If you use the skill again while it is already active, you will perform a powerful finishing move."
